title: Magic Animator (Beta)
author: Andrew Ologunebi
excerpt: Animate your designs in seconds. - Import SVGs, Lotties, from Figma or create from scratch - Speed up your animation workflow with AI - Animate with a simple but powerful editor and timeline - Export as Lottie, Gif or MP4 to any platform - Collaborate with your team
text: Animate your designs in seconds. - Import SVGs, Lotties, from Figma or create from scratch - Speed up your animation workflow with AI - Animate with a simple but powerful editor and timeline - Export as Lottie, Gif or MP4 to any platform - Collaborate with your team
